= Aerie Bitemporal Storage
:toc:
:toclevels: 2

== Purpose

Aerie requires bitemporal history for forensic certainty: valid-time and
transaction-time are both recorded and queryable.

== Store

* Modality: Verisim Temporal
* Model: hexad_id + valid_time + tx_time

== Indexes

* (hexad_id, valid_time)
* (hexad_id, tx_time)
* (policy_hash, tx_time)

== Notes

* All audit events are stored with both timestamps.
* Proof envelopes must reference tx_time.
